name: MyMind
0:
”Alexa, open My Mind”
”Alexa, start My Mind”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my mind
des:
Play an interactive Medical Infotainment-themed story with sound effects. Get ready for laughs and giggles. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. "The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number." At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.

My Mind is a reflection with a journal of the monkey mind in oneself and one's past. In this infotainment, we present the story of an eccentric educator, and how he practised 14 steps of quietening his monkey chitta, to lasting peace, inner peace. Meditation, compassion and mindfulness are the keys, coupled with expert taught Qigong, sacred hymns, pranayama and many other techniques, inspired by technology. Listen to this story to discover more.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
